attributes.action: Replace repeat 'ASBO's with 'A spell in the stocks'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ASBO offenders who reoffend should spend some time in town stocks or pillaries. This could be CCTV monitored for safety purposes. Waste fruit and veg could be obtained from local supermarkets. This would stop the ASBO being seen as an urban medal. This would reduce re-offending. Thugs do not like to be embarrassed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
